attributes.action: 24 hour/7 days a week Ultrasound Doctors Available for Emergencies
attributes.additional_details: Emergency scans during pregnancy to be made available 24 hours a day 7 days a week to all patients in all hospitals. If a pregnant lady is experiencing problems at the weekend throughout her pregnancy she should be given a scan to see what is going on, and not left to wait until the Monday morning which is what they do just now. It is added stress that the patient doesn't need.
